name: Blacksmith
description: Forger of weapons and mender of armor.

name: Librarian
description: Keeper of forbidden scrolls and ancient lore.

name: Alchemist
description: Mixes volatile potions and occasionally explodes things.

name: Gardener
description: Tends to rare herbs and dangerous carnivorous plants.

name: Bounty Hunter
description: Tracks down fugitives for coin and glory.

name: Cook
description: Specializes in making monster meat taste like chicken.

name: Town Guard
description: Patrols the streets and used to be an adventurer like you.

name: Fortune Teller
description: Uses crystal balls and cards to predict your doom.

name: Innkeeper
description: The primary source of rumors and overpriced ale.

name: Scribe
description: Expert in calligraphy and copying magical manuscripts.
